00025 #ifndef SWIRIL_PDP_COMMON_H
00026 #define SWIRIL_PDP_COMMON_H 1
00027 
00028 /* This CID is used for both profile and connection ID */
00029 #define SWI_DEFAULT_CID 1
00030 
00031 typedef enum {
00032     RIL_STATE_INACTIVE = 0,
00033     RIL_STATE_ACTIVE_LINKDOWN,
00034     RIL_STATE_ACTIVE_LINKUP
00035 } RIL_SessionState;
00036 
00037 typedef enum {
00038     RIL_TECH_CDMA = 0,
00039     RIL_TECH_UMTS
00040 } RIL_PDPTech;
00041 
00042 #ifndef SWI_RIL_VERSION_6
00043 typedef enum {
00044     RIL_PDP_PARAM_RADIO_TECH = 0,
00045     RIL_PDP_PARAM_DATA_PROFILE,
00046     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN,
00047     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN_USERNAME,
00048     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN_PASSWORD,
00049     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN_AUTH_TYPE,
00050 } RIL_PDPParams;
00051 #else
00052 /* Although RIL version 6 defines 8 parameters for RIL_REQUEST_SETUP_DATA_CALL, 
00053  * Java only sends 7 due to last parameter optional*/
00054 #define RIL_REQUEST_SETUP_DATA_CALL_REQUEST_PARAMS_MIN 7
00055 #define RIL_REQUEST_DEACTIVATE_DATA_CALL_REQUEST_PARAMS 2
00056 #define RIL_ACTIVATE_DATA_CALL_RETRY_NO_SUGGESTION -1
00057 
00058 typedef enum {
00059     RIL_PDP_PARAM_RADIO_TECH = 0,
00060     RIL_PDP_PARAM_DATA_PROFILE,
00061     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN,
00062     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN_USERNAME,
00063     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN_PASSWORD,
00064     RIL_PDP_PARAM_APN_AUTH_TYPE,
00065     RIL_PDP_PARAM_PDP_TYPE,
00066     RIL_PDP_PARAM_CONNECTION_PROPERTY 
00067 } RIL_PDPParams;
00068 
00069 typedef enum {
00070     RIL_DISCONNECT_REASON_NO_SPECIFIC = 0,
00071     RIL_DISCONNECT_REASON_RADIO_SHUTDOWN
00072 } RIL_DataCallDisconnectReason;
00073 #endif /* end of SWI_RIL_VERSION_6 */
00074 
00075 #endif /* end of SWIRIL_PDP_COMMON_H */
